name: Bol.com Partnerprogramma by Biz2Web
author: Biz2Web (niet Bol.com)

sections.description: Bol.com Partnerprogramma by Biz2Web enables site owners to insert Bol.com Partnerprogramma links into any page or post.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder wp-bolcom-affiliates to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin “Bol.com Partnerprogramma by Biz2Web” through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use option to insert link in post or page by clicking the Bol.com icon
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the folder wp-bolcom-affiliates to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin “Bol.com Partnerprogramma by Biz2Web” through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use option to insert link in post or page by clicking the Bol.com icon

Where do I Find my Bol.com site ID?

You can find your Bol.com site ID via:
https://partnerprogramma.bol.com/partner/affiliate/account.do

I can only see a shortcode and nothing else happens.

The plugin only works if a page or post is published.
Please make sure your content isn’t in concept to see if it works.
If not, please contact us and let us know.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • New URL scheme (https)

1.0.1

  • Changed plugin title to ‘Bol.com Partnerprogramma by Biz2Web’.
  • Made compatible with WordPress 4.0.

1.0

  • Final 1.0 release.

1.0 RC3 beta

  • Fixed issue with content-types. Some browsers refuse to execute scripts with incorrect content-types.

1.0 RC2 beta

  • Final comments by bol.com processed.
  • PLEASE UPDATE to ensure your plugin works correct.

1.0 RC1 beta

  • First public release. Uploaded to WordPress codex.

RC8

[FIXED]
* Internet Explorer once in a while cleared the TinyMCE editor content.
* Internet Explorer showed an annoying popup during search of items.

RC7

  • First public beta release.
